name: SkiFree Remake
description:
Remake of Ski Free, an old Windows game that came on the 90's PC's. Nostalgia level 1000! 

This game is top-down, in Unity 3D. The player controls a skier down the mountain while avoiding obstacles. The player can hit jumps to get big air (stick a quintuple backflip!) or can use the spacebar for quick manual jumps to score some extra points. Full trick scoring system w/ 2x points for combining spins and flips. Also includes slalom course. 

All obstacles spawn from GameObject pools for performance. Features full 90's themed UI / Intro, NPC skiers, Yetis that attack partway down mountain, particle systems, SFX, and exploding cats! :) 

Enjoy!
